content:
http://hl7.org/fhir/workflow-ad-hoc.html#12.7.1.3
Requires that the placer have authority to post directly to the placer's system

Should be directly to filler's system?
Yup. Can you submit a change request @Tim Zallin ?
J#25300 - change has been pre-applied, but it seems to need a vote... Isn't there a Jira way to fix typos without recording a vote?
Have to move them to be a technical correction rather than a change request
Ah! I thought technical corrections only applied to already published versions...

TechnicalCorrection would be the only type of item that could be applied to an already published version, but they can also be made to the 'current' release. Name changed from 'typo' to 'technical correction' in the move to Jira because it covers more than just typos (broken links, grammar, formatting problems, etc.) Key is that the change would be considered non-substantive and that there would be no reasonable debate as to whether a fix was needed or what it should be.
